content: **errata in pattern s finnish translation b-osio rivi 7 pitäisi olla * nosta 1 silmukka neulomatta neulo o kunnes 2 silmukkaa jäljellä neulo ete neulo 1o *** chasing blizzard is a simple asymmetrical scarf for chilly winter days not too fancy just stripes and simple mesh lace so this goes nicely for all styles and genders just pick two of your favorite contrasting skeins of next-to-skin soft yarn cast on and follow the instructions this is super easy yarn 2 skeins 1 mc 1 cc fingering weight 400m/100g eg kvgwoolworks 100% sw merino or kvgwoolworks sock 75/25 merino/polyamide needles 2 75 3 5 circular eg chiaogoo red lace interchangeables 2 75 gauge in garter stitch 26 sts x 32 row per 10cm/4in techniques cast on co knit k yarn over yo purl p knit two stitches together k2tog knit in front of the loop/back of the loop/front of the loop k1fbf slip_stitch without knitting s bind off bobble picot bind off optional size depending on your gauge and final blocking the measurements of this scarf are 220cm x 48cm / 86in x 19in a very special thank you for hélène of le crochet d argent 1 for french translation 1 https //www lecrochetdargent fr/en/chasing-blizzard/
